title: Genesis Chapter 10 Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of Genesis chapter 10 with 16 questions covering key people, places, events, and teachings from this chapter.

questions.question: What location is mentioned in Genesis 10:4?
questions.explanation: Genesis 10:4 states: "And the sons of Javan; Elishah, and Tarshish, Kittim, and Dodanim."

questions.question: What location is mentioned in Genesis 10:6?
questions.explanation: Genesis 10:6 states: "And the sons of Ham; Cush, and Mizraim, and Phut, and Canaan."

questions.question: Where did the events of Genesis 10:11 take place?
questions.explanation: Genesis 10:11 states: "Out of that land went forth Asshur, and builded Nineveh, and the city Rehoboth, and Calah,"

questions.question: What location is mentioned in Genesis 10:12?
questions.explanation: Genesis 10:12 states: "And Resen between Nineveh and Calah: the same is a great city."

questions.question: What location is mentioned in Genesis 10:15?
questions.explanation: Genesis 10:15 states: "And Canaan begat Sidon his firstborn, and Heth,"

questions.question: What location is mentioned in Genesis 10:19?
questions.explanation: Genesis 10:19 states: "And the border of the Canaanites was from Sidon, as thou comest to Gerar, unto Gaza; as thou goest, unto Sodom, and G..."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 10:1: "Now these are the generations of the sons of ______, Shem, Ham, and Japheth: and unto them were sons born after the flood."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "Now these are the generations of the sons of Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth: and unto them were sons born after the flood."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 10:2: "The ______ of Japheth; Gomer, and Magog, and Madai, and Javan, and Tubal, and Meshech, and Tiras."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "The sons of Japheth; Gomer, and Magog, and Madai, and Javan, and Tubal, and Meshech, and Tiras."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 10:3: "And the ______ of Gomer; Ashkenaz, and Riphath, and Togarmah."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And the sons of Gomer; Ashkenaz, and Riphath, and Togarmah."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 10:5: "By ______ were the isles of the Gentiles divided in their lands; every one after his tongue, after their families, in their nations."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "By these were the isles of the Gentiles divided in their lands; every one after his tongue, after their families, in ..."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 10:7: "And the ______ of Cush; Seba, and Havilah, and Sabtah, and Raamah, and Sabtecha: and the ______ of Raamah; Sheba, and Dedan."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And the sons of Cush; Seba, and Havilah, and Sabtah, and Raamah, and Sabtecha: and the sons of Raamah; Sheba, and Dedan."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 10:8: "And ______ begat Nimrod: he began to be a mighty one in the earth."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And Cush begat Nimrod: he began to be a mighty one in the earth."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 10:9: "He was a ______ hunter before the LORD: wherefore it is said, Even as Nimrod the ______ hunter before the LORD."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "He was a mighty hunter before the LORD: wherefore it is said, Even as Nimrod the mighty hunter before the LORD."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 10:10: "And the ______ of his kingdom was Babel, and Erech, and Accad, and Calneh, in the land of Shinar."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And the beginning of his kingdom was Babel, and Erech, and Accad, and Calneh, in the land of Shinar."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 10:13: "And ______ begat Ludim, and Anamim, and Lehabim, and Naphtuhim,"
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And Mizraim begat Ludim, and Anamim, and Lehabim, and Naphtuhim,"

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 10:14: "And ______, and Casluhim, (out of whom came Philistim,) and Caphtorim."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And Pathrusim, and Casluhim, (out of whom came Philistim,) and Caphtorim."
